<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="">[Practice Makes Perfect](/Spells.aspx?ID=559)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 65</row>

**Domain**
[Toil](/Domains.aspx?ID=39)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** You or an ally within range fails a skill check for a skill in which you or they are trained.

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The target gains a +2 status bonus to the triggering check, or a +3 bonus if the target has master or better proficiency in the skill. This bonus can change the outcome of the target’s check.
name: Practice Makes Perfect
